title: Famous Castles Recall
description: Test your memory of the world's most magnificent castles, from medieval fortresses to fairy-tale palaces.

questions.question: Windsor Castle, the oldest and largest occupied castle in the world, is located in which country?
Himeji Castle, known as the 'White Heron Castle' for its elegant white exterior, is located in which country?
The Tower of London, originally built by William the Conqueror, has served as a prison, palace, and what else?
options: A treasury and Crown Jewels vault

questions.question: Bran Castle in Romania is popularly associated with which fictional character?
The Château de Chenonceau, built spanning a river, is located in which French region?
Hohenzollern Castle, sitting atop a mountain at 855 meters, is located in which German state?
The Alcázar of Segovia, which also inspired a Disney castle design, is located in which country?
Bodiam Castle, a 14th-century moated castle, is located in which English county?
Kronborg Castle, the setting of Shakespeare's Hamlet, is located in which Scandinavian country?
Warwick Castle, one of the best-preserved medieval castles in England, sits on which river?
Matsumoto Castle, one of Japan's premier historic castles, is nicknamed what due to its black exterior?
The Citadel of Aleppo, one of the oldest and largest castles in the world, is in which country?
Conwy Castle, a medieval fortification built by Edward I, is located in which part of the United Kingdom?
